text: Maksim Perepelitsa () is a 1956 Soviet comedy movie directed by Anatoliy Granik.Алибасов опроверг сообщения об инфаркте у Федосеевой-ШукшинойМАКСИМ ПЕРЕПЕЛИЦА It stars Leonid Bykov, Lyudmila Kostirko, and Nikolai Yakovchenko. ==Actors== *Leonid Bykov as Maksim Perepelitsa *Lyudmila Kostirko as Maroussia, Maksim's bride *Nikolai Yakovchenko as blacksmith Kondrat Perepelitsa, Maksim's father *Aleksandr Borisov as postman Marco Mukha, Kondrat's friend *George Asipenka as Opanas, Kondrat's friend *Basil Fushchych as Stepan Levada, one of Maksim == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1956 comedy movies Category:Soviet comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Anatoliy Granik
title: Maksim Perepelitsa
